text: Tanya Louise Bardsley (n√©e Robinson; born 29 April 1981) is an English model, socialite and reality television personality. She is known for starring in The Real Housewives of Cheshire from 2015 to 2021. After appearing on The Real Housewives of Cheshire, she was a celebrity contestant on multiple reality shows including Celebrity Karaoke Club, Celebs on the Farm and Celebrity Coach Trip. She is married to footballer Phil Bardsley and they have four children. Bardsley has spoken about being diagnosed with dyslexia and ADHD. She formerly owned a shop in Wilmslow but closed it in 2022. == Sources == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:English models Category:English television personalities
title: Tanya Bardsley
